TopicTitle: In map view, can't select to see or remove crafts, flags etc. (+ workaround)

Articles.Content:
When in map view, I can't select the various toggle display flag, ship, lander buttons. I can see them but clicking does nothing.

Only when I bring up the globe at the foot of the window (to allow you to control the craft in map view) can I use the toggles described above. Potential show stopper- I know.

Apologies if not a bug and if this is one of those "I went to the doctor's and told him it hurts when I do this...." moments.

Mods:

- Kerbal Alarm Clock

- Mech Jeb (not compatible with Economic Boom)

- Kethane (not compatible with Economic Boom)

I'll try to check back in case someone helpfully and absolutely not pedantically suggests more information I need to supply but I am way more likely to forget my password again so no holding of breath.

Thanks.

Honestly? Try removing the incompatible mods first.

If there's still an issue, we're going to need a log file, at minimum. See the READ FIRST sticky for where to get that.
